#summary A summary of the documentation available for the project
#labels documentation

= Documentation =

The documentation available for the project is as follows:
 * These wiki pages, including [FAQs]! (See the side-bar on left to navigate);
 * The paper describing JIDT at [http://arxiv.org/abs/1408.3270 arXiv:1408.3270] (PDF is distributed with the toolkit);
 * Javadocs fully describing the Java class hierarchy and API for each class are distributed in the `javadocs` folder of the distribution
 * The [Demos] distributed with the toolkit give examples on how to use the various classes, including how to use it in [OctaveMatlabExamples Matlab and GNU Octave], [PythonExamples Python] and [R_Examples R].
 * The [JUnitTestCases unit tests] distributed with the toolkit provide additional examples on how to run the code.

You can also join our [http://groups.google.com/d/forum/jidt-discuss jidt-discuss] mailing list for announcements, help and discussion.
